ing: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple, in juice
des: "A mixture of pineapple, flour, butter eggs and cinnamon. Excellent side dish with ham or pork roast. My in-laws are from Pennsylvania; this recipe is from some of the aunts who live there. A Christmas dinner must-have!"
ins:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, mix together the butter, flour, eggs and sugar until well blended. Stir in the crushed pineapple. Transfer to a small casserole dish, and sprinkle cinnamon over the top.
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, uncovered. Serve warm.
